name: Spring Fever Ladies Scarf
description: Super soft and furry hand knit scarf will keep you warm and totally chic at the same time. The soft yellow and lavender will cheer you and remind you of the warmer days ahead.

name: Choose Your Own Adventure Custom Mittens
description: Custom made mittens in the funky fresh Fuzzy Paws Knits Style! You choose the colors (up to 3) and Fuzzy Paws will hand knit the mitts of your dreams! Cut & paste this link to see samples of my mitts on Flickr: http://www.flickr.com/search/?q=mittens&w=41176967%40N00 *Because your mitts are knit-to-order, please allow 2 weeks for the creation of your one of a kind purchase. These are an adult average size. Fit most ladies and men. If you are interested in kid’s sizes, I can do that too! —-I suggest hand washing in lukewarm water, then drying flat for best results. When purchasing, please let me know the following: Color choices (up to 3) Please let me know if you have any fiber allergies If you have any questions, please ask before you purchase. Email me or check out my store for more information. About Shipping* I ship USPS via the least expensive means. I am not responsible for lost items. If you would like delivery confirmation, please let me know. You will need to pay additional shipping.
